channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Rip-Off Britain
channel.desc: Gloria Hunniford, Louise Minchin and Julia Somerville meet the families unravelling the family trusts set up decades ago to protect an inheritance but which are now proving complex and costly. Also on the programme, the mystery credit card transactions that left one man battling to prove his identity and clear the black mark on his credit file. Our advice clinic will have tips on how you can be on your guard against the same problem.
